from sctrans.T_TO_CASE_MERGE m where m.APPLY_STATUS='1' and m.OPERATOR='1' and m.CONFIRMOR_ID is not null and m.APPLY_DIRECTION is not null and exists (select top 1 * from sctrans.T_TO_CASE where CASE_CODE=m.C_CASE_CODE and STATUS ='30001007' ) and m.CASE_CODE= #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
